post:
Are you looking for total flexibility to adapt the power of each VM?
The CloudArion service is the perfect solution.

Cloudarion has been a major presence in the Web Hosting market since 2011. All of our staff is in-house and we pride ourselves on operating our own networks and infrastructures. Our SSD VPS hosting is considered one of the most desired packages. If you add our high quality to the potency of SSD VPS hosting, you will receive a winning package. We have always been proud of our 99.9% uptime on VPS systems.

Our hosting services are powered by Intel Xeon E5-2670 and Intel Core i7-6700 processors. Most customers believe that our VPS hosting package is an exceptional offering. This package is specifically designed for high quality service of media, site content, gaming, databases and almost anything else you can imagine. Every individual machine has a limitation of no more than 30 VPS per individual node on XEN/KVM technology that is RAID10 allowing all systems to quickly handle any issues pertaining to CPU, memory and IO limitations that occur and that diminish quality when additional VPS are added to nodes.
